name: Soul Search (theythemgames)
description:
Travel through a serene wilderness maze and find lots of beauty, but most of all find yourself. 

**Added Windows (x86) .exe to remedy lagging issues in browser. We're hoping this helps the problems people were having with playing!**

Free Game Asset Packs by KENNEY.nl. & VARRRG

Music: Fragments by AERØHEAD
